backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a landing-page update to add a print‑on‑demand info line referencing App.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of several frontend files including App.tsx, index.css, tailwind config, HTML entry, and main.tsx.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens and dark‑mode variants for the site’s theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry including meta description, title, root mount point, and script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React landing page UI with hero section, print‑on‑demand text, contact numbers, gallery, about section, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and refreshes a backend actor using identity from Internet Identity and react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks handling Internet Identity authentication, login, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind root variables defining charcoal‑ivory palette with gold accents plus typography and dark‑mode styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Main entry rendering App inside InternetIdentityProvider and QueryClientProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the current project state and requirements for building a styled single‑page Zayora website with branding, images, clickable phone numbers, and a forthcoming products section. Lists implemented features, metadata updates, and visual design expectations.
